## PublishQueue() function

Assigns this method input to publish queue Only one publish per method!

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function PublishQueue(name: string, options?: PublishQueueOptions): (target: WebSocketClient, propertyKey: string, descriptor: any) => any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of queue to be published to |
|  options | <code>PublishQueueOptions</code> | Options for publish queue |

<b>Returns:</b>

`(target: WebSocketClient, propertyKey: string, descriptor: any) => any`
